00403    #if UTIL_MPI
00404    /*
00405    * Pack an object of type T into send buffer.
00406    */
00407    template <typename T>
00408    void Buffer::pack(const T& data)
00409    {
00410       if (sendPtr_ + sizeof(data) > sendBufferEnd_) {
00411          UTIL_THROW("Attempted write past end of send buffer");
00412       }
00413       T* ptr = (T *)sendPtr_;
00414       *ptr = data;
00415       ++ptr;
00416       sendPtr_ = (char *)ptr;
00417    }
00418 
00419    /*
00420    * Unpack an object of type T from recvBuffer.
00421    */
00422    template <typename T>
00423    void Buffer::unpack(T& data)
00424    {
00425       if (recvPtr_ + sizeof(data) > recvBufferEnd_) {
00426          UTIL_THROW("Attempted read past end of recv buffer");
00427       }
00428       T* ptr = (T *)recvPtr_;
00429       data = *ptr;
00430       ++ptr;
00431       recvPtr_ = (char *)ptr;
00432    }
00433 
00434    /*
00435    * Pack a Group.
00436    */
00437    template <int N>
00438    void Buffer::packGroup(const Group<N>& group)
00439    {
00440       // Preconditions
00441       if (sendType_ != GROUP) {
00442          UTIL_THROW("SendType is not GROUP");
00443       }
00444       if (sendGroupSize_ != N) {
00445          UTIL_THROW("Wrong sendGroupSize");
00446       }
00447       pack<int>(group.id());
00448       pack<int>(group.typeId());
00449       for (int j = 0; j < N; ++j) {
00450          pack<int>(group.atomId(j));
00451       }
00452       pack<unsigned int>(group.plan().flags());
00453 
00454       //Increment number of groups in send buffer by 1
00455       ++sendSize_;
00456    }
00457 
00458    /*
00459    * Unpack the next Group in the recieve buffer.
00460    */
00461    template <int N>
00462    void Buffer::unpackGroup(Group<N>& group)
00463    {
00464       // Preconditions
00465       if (recvType_ != GROUP) {
00466          UTIL_THROW("SendType is not GROUP");
00467       }
00468       if (recvGroupSize_ != N) {
00469          UTIL_THROW("Wrong recvGroupSize");
00470       }
00471       int i;
00472       unpack(i);
00473       group.setId(i);
00474       unpack(i);
00475       group.setTypeId(i);
00476       for (int j = 0; j < N; ++j) {
00477          unpack(i);
00478          group.setAtomId(j, i);
00479          group.clearAtomPtr(j);
00480       }
00481 
00482       // Unpack communication plan
00483       unsigned int ui;
00484       unpack(ui);
00485       group.plan().setFlags(ui);
00486 
00487       // Decrement number of groups in recv buffer by 1
00488       recvSize_--;
00489    }
00490    #endif
00491 
00492 }
00493 #endif
